title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Join India's leading IT services company as a software engineering intern. Work on cutting-edge projects using Java, Python, and cloud technologies. Gain experience in enterprise software development and digital transformation projects.

title: Data Science Intern
description: Work with Infosys data science team on machine learning projects, predictive analytics, and big data solutions. Use Python, R, and advanced ML libraries to solve real-world business problems.

title: Frontend Development Intern
description: Develop modern web applications using React, Angular, and Vue.js. Work on responsive UI/UX designs and integrate with backend APIs. Experience with modern frontend frameworks and tools.

title: Backend Development Intern
description: Build scalable backend systems using Node.js, Python, and cloud platforms. Work on API development, database design, and microservices architecture. Experience with AWS, Azure, or GCP preferred.

title: AI/ML Research Intern
description: Join Microsoft's AI research team in India to work on cutting-edge machine learning projects. Focus on computer vision, natural language processing, and deep learning applications.

title: DevOps Intern
description: Work with Amazon's DevOps team on cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and automation. Gain hands-on experience with AWS services, Kubernetes, and infrastructure as code.

title: Cybersecurity Intern
description: Join IBM's cybersecurity team to work on security assessments, penetration testing, and security tool development. Learn about network security, cryptography, and security frameworks.

title: Mobile Development Intern
description: Develop mobile applications for India's leading e-commerce platform. Work with React Native, Flutter, and native Android/iOS development. Experience with mobile testing and app store deployment.

title: Full Stack Development Intern
description: Build complete web applications for India's food delivery platform. Work on both frontend and backend technologies using modern frameworks and databases.

title: Cloud Engineering Intern
description: Work with Google Cloud Platform team on scalable cloud solutions. Learn about cloud architecture, serverless computing, and cloud security using GCP services.

title: Blockchain Development Intern
description: Work on blockchain projects using Solidity, Web3, and various blockchain platforms. Focus on smart contracts, decentralized applications, and cryptocurrency applications.

title: Game Development Intern
description: Develop mobile and web-based games using Unity, C#, and various game development tools. Work on game design, 3D modeling, and animation for Indian gaming market.

title: UI/UX Design Intern
description: Design user interfaces and user experiences for India's leading edtech platform. Work on web and mobile applications using Figma, Sketch, and Adobe Creative Suite.

title: Product Management Intern
description: Work on product strategy, market research, and feature planning for India's food delivery platform. Collaborate with engineering and design teams to deliver user-focused products.

title: Quality Assurance Intern
description: Work on software testing, test automation, and quality assurance processes for India's leading fintech platform. Learn about manual testing, automated testing frameworks, and bug tracking.

title: Database Administration Intern
description: Work with Oracle database systems, database design, and performance optimization. Learn about database security, backup strategies, and database administration best practices.

title: Network Engineering Intern
description: Work on network infrastructure, security, and monitoring using Cisco technologies. Learn about network protocols, routing, switching, and network security solutions.

title: Digital Marketing Intern
description: Work on digital marketing campaigns, social media marketing, and analytics for India's leading fashion e-commerce platform. Experience with SEO, content creation, and marketing tools.

title: Business Intelligence Intern
description: Work on data analysis, reporting, and dashboard creation for India's leading telecom company. Use tools like Tableau, Power BI, and SQL to create business insights.

title: Sales Engineering Intern
description: Work on technical sales, product demonstrations, and customer support for Salesforce CRM solutions. Learn about technical sales processes and customer relationship management.

title: Content Management Intern
description: Work on content creation, editing, and publishing for India's leading digital media company. Experience with CMS platforms, SEO, and content strategy.

title: IT Support Intern
description: Work on technical support, system administration, and troubleshooting for enterprise clients. Learn about IT infrastructure management and help desk operations.

title: E-commerce Development Intern
description: Work on e-commerce platform development, payment processing, and online store management. Experience with e-commerce frameworks, payment gateways, and order management systems.

title: AR/VR Development Intern
description: Work on augmented reality and virtual reality applications for Indian market. Experience with Unity, Unreal Engine, and AR/VR frameworks for immersive experiences.

title: IoT Development Intern
description: Work on Internet of Things projects, embedded systems, and connected devices for smart city solutions. Experience with microcontrollers, sensors, and IoT platforms.

title: FinTech Development Intern
description: Work on financial technology applications, payment systems, and banking solutions for India's digital payment ecosystem. Experience with secure financial applications and compliance.

title: HealthTech Development Intern
description: Work on healthcare applications, medical software, and health data management for India's healthcare sector. Experience with healthcare APIs and medical data processing.

title: EdTech Development Intern
description: Work on educational technology platforms, learning management systems, and online education solutions for Indian students. Experience with educational content delivery and assessment systems.

title: AgriTech Development Intern
description: Work on agricultural technology solutions, precision farming, and IoT applications for Indian agriculture. Experience with farming applications and agricultural data analysis.

title: GreenTech Development Intern
description: Work on environmental technology solutions, sustainability applications, and green energy systems for India's renewable energy sector. Focus on solar and wind energy applications.

title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Join Microsoft's global software engineering team. Work on cutting-edge projects using C#, .NET, Azure, and modern development practices. Gain experience in enterprise software development.

title: Data Science Intern
description: Work with Google's data science team on machine learning projects, big data analytics, and AI research. Use Python, TensorFlow, and Google Cloud Platform for advanced analytics.

title: Frontend Development Intern
description: Develop user interfaces for Meta's social media platforms. Work with React, JavaScript, and modern frontend technologies to create engaging user experiences.

title: Backend Development Intern
description: Build scalable backend systems for Amazon's e-commerce platform. Work with Java, AWS services, and microservices architecture to handle millions of users.

title: AI/ML Research Intern
description: Join OpenAI's research team to work on cutting-edge AI projects including natural language processing, computer vision, and reinforcement learning. Contribute to advancing AI technology.
